    $(function() {
        if (typeof dnn != "undefined" && typeof dnn.searchSkinObject != "undefined") {
            var searchSkinObject = new dnn.searchSkinObject({
                delayTriggerAutoSearch : 400,
                minCharRequiredTriggerAutoSearch : 2,
                searchType: 'S',

            var webBtn = $('#dnn_dnnSEARCH_WebRadioButton');

                else searchSkinObject.settings.searchType = 'W';
            };
            siteBtn.on('change', clickHandler);
            webBtn.on('change', clickHandler);

    $(function() {
        if (typeof dnn != "undefined" && typeof dnn.searchSkinObject != "undefined") {
            var searchSkinObject = new dnn.searchSkinObject({
                delayTriggerAutoSearch : 400,
                minCharRequiredTriggerAutoSearch : 2,
                searchType: 'S',
                enableWildSearch: true,
                cultureCode: 'en-US',
                portalId: -1
                }
            );
            searchSkinObject.init();
            
            
            // attach classic search
            var siteBtn = $('#dnn_dnnSEARCH2_SiteRadioButton');
            var webBtn = $('#dnn_dnnSEARCH2_WebRadioButton');
            var clickHandler = function() {
                if (siteBtn.is(':checked')) searchSkinObject.settings.searchType = 'S';
                else searchSkinObject.settings.searchType = 'W';
            };
            siteBtn.on('change', clickHandler);
            webBtn.on('change', clickHandler);
            
            
        }
    });

    <div id="dnn_ctr1066_ContentPane" class="contentpane"><!-- Start_Module_1066 --><div id="dnn_ctr1066_ModuleContent" class="DNNModuleContent ModDNNHTMLC">
	<div id="dnn_ctr1066_HtmlModule_lblContent"><div class="functionList_3 row">
	<div class="functionBox col-sm-4">
		<a style="width: 310px; height: 310px;" href="/publicpolicy"><img title="Advocacy" alt="Megaphone-Icon" src="/portals/0/tha-icons/megaphone-tha-brand-icon.png"></a>
		<h3>Advocacy</h3>
		<p>
From the capitol to regulatory agencies, THA represents the interests of its member hospitals/health systems. With in-depth knowledge of issues that matter most to Texas hospitals, THA is frequently asked to provide expert testimony and help craft rules to implement recently passed legislation. THA also provides Texas hospitals with a presence in Washington, D.C.
		</p>
		<a class="btn-default" href="/publicpolicy">Read More</a>
		<a class="btn-default" href="/2017LegislativeSession">2017 Legislative Session</a>
	</div>
	<div class="functionBox col-sm-4">
		<a style="width: 310px; height: 310px;" href="/THA-Foundation/Education"><img title="Education" alt="Podium-Icon" src="/portals/0/tha-icons/podium-tha-brand-icon.png"></a>
		<h3>Education</h3>
		<p>
THA offers hospital administrators and staff a broad range of continuing education focused on enhancing hospital operations and performance. In the health care industry, change is constant. With this in mind, THA develops programs to help members strategize and meet head-on the challenges of frequent changes in regulations and obligations. Use the
			<a href="http://store.tha.org/PersonifyEbusiness/Default.aspx?TabID=1355&&SSOForce=Y" target="_blank">Event Calendar</a> to find upcoming educational opportunities.
		</p>
		<a class="btn-default" href="/THA-Foundation/Education">Read More</a>
	</div>
	<div class="functionBox col-sm-4">
		<a style="width: 310px; height: 310px;" href="/capitolupdate"><img title="Texting" alt="Texting-Icon" src="/portals/0/tha-icons/warning-tha-brand-icon.png"></a>
		<h3>Capitol Update</h3>
		<p>
			<a href="http://www.tha.org/capitolupdate"><img src="https://dnnsymkuj.blob.core.windows.net/portals/0/Images/Advocacy/CapitolUpdate/CapUpdate_030818_JB_ss.jpg?sr=b&si=DNNFileManagerPolicy&sig=gBTtz%2FUe%2F9mt1jnWtppVTpy%2Fi25tdWqQ%2Fvb8REzmais%3D" border="0" alt="Capitol Update for March 8 2018" title="Capitol Update for March 8 2018" style="width: 100% !important;"></a>
		</p>
		<p>
			Jennifer Banda, J.D., and Lance Lunsford of THA discuss the March 6 Texas primaries in the latest Capitol Update.
		</p>
		<a href="http://www.tha.org/capitolupdate" class="btn-default">Read more</a>
	</div>

				<h4>Texas Hospitals’ Use of Plain Language Emergency Alerts Grows</h4>
				<p>
					<strong>
					(March 1)</strong> Hospitals across Texas continue to transition from hospital-specific, color-based emergency codes to standardized, plain language alerts as part of their work to promote safety, reduce errors and increase transparency of communications and safety protocols ...
				</p>
				<a href="https://www.tha.org/Public-Policy/Newsroom/Texas-Hospitals-Use-of-Plain-Language-Emergency-Alerts-Grows" class="btn-default">Read more</a>
			</div>

				<h4>Texas Hospital Association Endorses Use of Voluntary Emergency Department Prescribing Guidelines to Curb Opioid Misuse and Abuse</h4>
				<h6 style="padding-bottom: 10px"><em>Texas hospitals lead initiative to reduce opioid deaths</em></h6>
				<p>
					<strong>
					(Feb. 9)</strong> The Texas Hospital Association recommends that Texas hospitals voluntarily adopt its guidelines to advise prescribers working in hospital emergency departments of ways to minimize inappropriate use of opioid painkillers and ultimately reduce the number of opioid-related deaths ...
				</p>
				<a href="https://www.tha.org/Public-Policy/Newsroom/Texas-Hospital-Association-Endorses-Use-of-Voluntary-Emergency-Department-Prescribing-Guidelines-to-Curb-Opioid-Misuse-and-Abuse" class="btn-default">Read more</a>
			</div>
			<div class="col-sm-3">
				<h4>Texas Hospital Association Releases Special Report On Hospital Disaster Response During Hurricane Harvey</h4>
				<h6 style="padding-bottom: 10px"><em>Report Offers Findings and Recommendations to Improve Disaster Preparedness and Response for Future Events</em></h6>
				<p>
					<strong>
					(Feb. 7)</strong> The Texas Hospital Association today released a special report analyzing Texas hospitals’ disaster response before, during and after Hurricane Harvey, including findings and recommendations for future preparation strategies ...
				</p>
				<a class="btn-default" href="https://www.tha.org/Public-Policy/Newsroom/Texas-Hospital-Association-Releases-Special-Report-on-Hospital-Disaster-Response-During-Hurricane-Harvey">Read more</a>
			</div>
			<div class="col-sm-3">
				<h4>Texas Hospital Association Honors Barclay Berdan</h4>
				<h6 style="padding-bottom: 10px"><em>HOSPAC Star Award Recognizes Hospital Leader’s Advocacy and Engagement</em></h6>
				<p>
					<strong>
					(Feb. 6)</strong> The Texas Hospital Association and its political action committee, HOSPAC, today honored Barclay Berdan, FACHE, CEO of Texas Health Resources in Arlington, with the 2017 HOSPAC Star Award for his commitment to political and public policy advocacy ...
				</p>
				<a href="https://www.tha.org/Public-Policy/Newsroom/Texas-Hospital-Association-Honors-Barclay-Berdan" class="btn-default">Read more</a>

	  <div class="dnntitle"> <span class="Icon_1"> </span>

  </div>

  <div class="contentmain1">
  
    <div id="dnn_CL_44_ctr4124_ContentPane" class="contentpane"><!-- Start_Module_4124 --><div id="dnn_CL_44_ctr4124_ModuleContent" class="DNNModuleContent ModDNNHTMLC">
	<div id="dnn_CL_44_ctr4124_HtmlModule_lblContent"><h3>Recent White Papers</h3>
<p>
The Texas Hospital Association often publishes white papers on issues affecting Texas hospitals and the health care of Texans.
</p>
<p>
	<strong>2017 Special Session Report:</strong> A comprehensive reference guide summarizing new legislation from the 2017 Special Session that impacts Texas hospitals and provides insights into how hospitals will be affected. <a href="/Portals/0/files/PublicPolicy/2017_Special_Session_Report.pdf" target="_blank">Learn more</a>
</p>
<p>
	<strong>Federal Policy Priorities:</strong> The more than 600 hospitals that serve Texas patients are a diverse group. Yet, whether they are an 8-bed critical access hospital or 800-bed health system, all Texas hospitals share a common mission of providing the best care to anyone who needs it. <a href="https://dnnsymkuj.blob.core.windows.net/portals/0/Federal/Federal%20Policy%20Priorities.pdf?sr=b&si=DNNFileManagerPolicy&sig=2wyzdrFUuNLrRunNG9I13d6sLyiuzupAbhx%2BM0Rskkc%3D" target="_blank">Learn more</a>
</p>
<p>
	<strong>Disallowance of Federal Uncompensated Care Payments for Texas Hospitals: </strong> Nearly $30 million in federal payments intended to offset some uncompensated care costs for private hospitals in the Dallas-Fort Worth region are the subject of disagreement between the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services and the state of Texas. <a href="https://dnnsymkuj.blob.core.windows.net/portals/0/Issues/1115Waiver/Resources/Disallowance%20One-Pager.pdf?sr=b&si=DNNFileManagerPolicy&sig=dtqBSgZSx%2BENXhdXPsPx3ng7EG%2Fy8cxOSvfsVyC9fP0%3D" target="_blank">Learn more</a>
</p>
<p>
	<strong>1115 Medicaid Transformation Waiver:</strong> Learn how the Transformation Waiver is making health care in Texas more effective and efficient and why renewal is so important for Texas hospitals. <a href="/LinkClick.aspx?link=https%3a%2f%2fdnnsymkuj.blob.core.windows.net%2fportals%2f0%2fState%2fHealth%2520Care%2520Innovation%2520in%2520Texas%2520Renewing%2520the%2520Medicaid%2520Transformation%2520Waiver.pdf%3fsr%3db%26si%3dDNNFileManagerPolicy%26sig%3da3UsR4d5rKpy5D4FNDLU%252ByjTGSGhbnKrBtpk9tIZ9dw%253D&tabid=266&portalid=0&mid=1627" target="_blank">Learn more</a>
</p></div>




</div><!-- End_Module_4124 --></div>
  </div>
  <!--Container Content End--> 
</div>

<div class="Container-3"> 
  <!--Container Title-->
  <div class="dnntitle">
    <span id="dnn_ctr1627_dnnTITLE3_titleLabel" class="title3">Recent White Papers</span>

  <div class="contentmain1">
  
    <div id="dnn_ctr1627_ContentPane" class="contentpane"><!-- Start_Module_1627 --><div id="dnn_ctr1627_ModuleContent" class="DNNModuleContent ModDNNHTMLC">
	<div id="dnn_ctr1627_HtmlModule_lblContent"><p>
The Texas Hospital Association often publishes white papers on issues affecting Texas hospitals and the health care of Texans.
</p>
<p><strong>Texas Medicaid in Perspective:</strong> Texas Medicaid, operated in partnership with the federal government, serves primarily low-income pregnant women and children but also individuals with disabilities and older adults. <a href="/LinkClick.aspx?link=https%3a%2f%2fdnnsymkuj.blob.core.windows.net%2fportals%2f0%2fIssues%2fMedicaidReimbursement%2fTx_Medicaid_In_Perspective.pdf%3fsr%3db%26si%3dDNNFileManagerPolicy%26sig%3dYyqc5pqahPytUsN%252Bp5nafOLURPWajaiqfoOSLkn4S%252BE%253D&amp;tabid=266&amp;portalid=0&amp;mid=1627" target="_blank">Learn More</a></p>
<p><strong>2017 Texas Hospitals&rsquo; Policy Priorities: </strong>Hospitals also are required by federal law to provide, at a minimum, a medical screening to anyone who seeks it and to provide stabilization and treatment services for an emergency medical condition, regardless of a patient&rsquo;s ability to pay. <a href="/LinkClick.aspx?link=https%3a%2f%2fdnnsymkuj.blob.core.windows.net%2fportals%2f0%2fIssues%2fTHA_2017_Policy_Priorities.pdf%3fsr%3db%26si%3dDNNFileManagerPolicy%26sig%3ddbXD3lGSsRHwvlvjgNaF9oIt0sUgyJ5xewY5XxWde%252BY%253D&amp;tabid=266&amp;portalid=0&amp;mid=1627" target="_blank">Learn more</a></p>
<p><strong>Hospital Financing Overview:</strong>&nbsp;This document is intended to provide a high-level overview of the hospital financing system in Texas and the challenges that exist &ndash; challenges that threaten hospitals&rsquo; continued ability to provide the highest quality care for all Texans. <a href="/LinkClick.aspx?link=https%3a%2f%2fdnnsymkuj.blob.core.windows.net%2fportals%2f0%2fIssues%2fMedicaidReimbursement%2fHospital_Financing_Overview.pdf%3fsr%3db%26si%3dDNNFileManagerPolicy%26sig%3d7WBxtqqotNpyr7yCLhySIy3jy7AjVFW2hQWVQk8tkPs%253D&amp;tabid=266&amp;portalid=0&amp;mid=1627" target="_blank">Learn More</a></p>
<p>
<strong>1115 Medicaid&nbsp;Transformation Waiver:</strong> Learn how the Transformation Waiver is making health care in Texas more effective and efficient and why renewal is so important for Texas hospitals.&nbsp;<a href="/LinkClick.aspx?link=https%3a%2f%2fdnnsymkuj.blob.core.windows.net%2fportals%2f0%2fState%2fHealth%2520Care%2520Innovation%2520in%2520Texas%2520Renewing%2520the%2520Medicaid%2520Transformation%2520Waiver.pdf%3fsr%3db%26si%3dDNNFileManagerPolicy%26sig%3da3UsR4d5rKpy5D4FNDLU%252ByjTGSGhbnKrBtpk9tIZ9dw%253D&amp;tabid=266&amp;portalid=0&amp;mid=1627" target="_blank">Learn more</a></p></div>

	function customMap() {
		
				
					$('#gmap01').gmap3({
			  marker:{
				values:[{
				  address:'1108 Lavaca, Suite 700, Austin Tx 79701', 
				  data:'',
				  options:{
												icon: "/Portals/_default/Skins/20047-UnlimitedColorPack-033/Thumbnails/mapicon02.png"
																	  }
				  }],
				options:{
				  draggable: false
				},
				events:{
				  click: function(marker, event, context){
					var map = $(this).gmap3("get"),
					  infowindow = $(this).gmap3({get:{name:"infowindow"}});
					if (infowindow){
					  infowindow.open(map, marker);
					  infowindow.setContent(context.data);
					} else {
					  $(this).gmap3({
						infowindow:{
						  anchor:marker, 
						  options:{content: context.data}
						}
					  });
					}
				  },
				  closeclick: function(){
					var infowindow = $(this).gmap3({get:{name:"infowindow"}});
					if (infowindow){
					  infowindow.close();
					}
				  }
				}
			  },
			  map:{
				options:{
					mapTypeId: google.maps.MapTypeId.ROADMAP,
					mapTypeControl: true,
					mapTypeControlOptions: {
					  style: google.maps.MapTypeControlStyle.DROPDOWN_MENU
					},
					navigationControl: true ,
				  zoom: 8,
				  scrollwheel: true
				}
			  }
			});

				  draggable: false
				},
				events:{
				  click: function(marker, event, context){
					var map = $(this).gmap3("get"),
					  infowindow = $(this).gmap3({get:{name:"infowindow"}});
					if (infowindow){
